question: Is this increment too large? Should it be broken into smaller increments?
outcome: Determines whether to split increments for better manageability and delivery
options: Keep increment as-is – Current scope is appropriate
Split by user journey stage – Break into increments that represent distinct journey phases
Split by user type – Separate increments for different user personas or roles
Split by capability – Break into increments representing distinct system capabilities
Split by domain boundary – Separate increments by bounded context or domain area
Split by risk/value – Separate high-risk or high-value items into dedicated increments
Split by dependency – Separate increments based on technical or business dependencies
